_sText:
cs_rottenmotel

Hostage rescue

Map made by ErQi_fin ( me )

The terrorists were angry about bad service in this motel and as revenge they decided to take 4 hostages.

Map is designed for small LAN - gaming, it's small, so it's best played with 2 - 12 players.

Please comment and give some ideas how to make this map better in future ( now I won't touch this project )
